participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and friendly, with a love for the outdoors and teaching.
participant_1.background: I like to watch Seinfeld and It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia while on my boat. I have lots of friends. I found a hidden cave in the mountains while hiking with my dogs. I like to read diabetes blogs to learn about new ways to control my condition. I'm a teacher and I'm looking for a way to satisfy my hunger so that I can continue teaching my students.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Creative and energetic, with a passion for the arts and a love for nature.
participant_2.background: I usually wake up early, eat a quick breakfast, and review my classes before heading out the door. I loved playing outside with my friends and riding my bike. I love the feeling of creating something beautiful, and I find that jewelry design is a great way to express my creativity. I love to read books. I like to dye my hair a variety of colors, but my favorite is a dark shade of teal.

content.text: It's going well! I just got back from a hike in the mountains.
That sounds awesome! I love hiking. Have you ever found any cool caves while you were hiking?
Actually, I have! I found a hidden cave in the mountains while hiking with my dogs a few years ago. It was really cool!
That's amazing! I've always wanted to find a hidden cave. What was it like inside?
It was really dark and cool. There was a little stream running through it and some stalactites and stalagmites. It was really beautiful.
That sounds amazing! I wish I could've seen it.
Maybe you can find one of your own someday!
I hope so! I'd love to explore a hidden cave.
It's definitely a lot of fun. You should definitely give it a try if you get the chance.
I will! Thanks for the suggestion!
